Source code for havoc.autoval.lib.test_utils.coldstorage_runner

from __future__ import absolute_import
from __future__ import division
from __future__ import print_function
from __future__ import unicode_literals

from havoc.autoval.lib.test_utils.test_utils_base import TestUtilsBase
from havoc.autotest_testfiles.validation_utils.lib.autoval import AutovalUtils
from havoc.autoval.lib.test_utils.coldstorage_utils import ColdStorageUtils
from havoc.lib.decorators import retry
from havoc.autotest_testfiles.validation_utils.lib.autoval_thread import AutovalThread
from havoc.autoval.lib.host.host import Host

import time



[docs]class ColdStorageRunner(TestUtilsBase):

[docs]    def __init__(self, host, args):
        super(ColdStorageRunner, self).__init__()
        self.host = host
        self.DEFAULT_ARGS = {
            "slots": 36,
            "type": "SATA",
            "maxhdd": 4,
            "fw": "exp-27.14.0.18",
            "num_expanders": 6,
            "interface_speed": "12.0 Gbit",
            "controllers_number": 2,
            "cycle_count" : 1,
            "write_control_file" : "",
            "read_control_file" : "",
            "test" : ""
        }

        self.cycle_count = args[0]
        self.write_control_file = args[1]
        self.read_control_file = args[2]
        self.test = args[3]
        self.cold_storage_utils = ColdStorageUtils()



[docs]    def test_setup(self):
        if self.cycle_count:
            self.DEFAULT_ARGS["cycle_count"] = self.cycle_count
        if self.write_control_file:
            self.DEFAULT_ARGS["write_control_file"] = self.write_control_file
        if self.read_control_file:
            self.DEFAULT_ARGS["read_control_file"] = self.read_control_file
        if self.test:
            self.DEFAULT_ARGS["test"] = self.test

        # Run bancsi
        self.cold_storage_utils._bancsi(self.host)
        # check if fio is installed
        self.cold_storage_utils.tools_check(self.host)
        # Powercycle the enclosure before starting the test
        self.run_powercycle_enclosure()

        # Clear phy errors
        self.cold_storage_utils.clear_phy_errors(self.host)
        self.cold_storage_utils.clear_adapter_errors(self.host)
        self.cfg_filter = self.get_cycle_config_filter()



[docs]    @retry(tries=3, sleep_seconds=60)
    def run_powercycle_enclosure(self):
        self.cold_storage_utils.powercycle_enclosure(self.host)



[docs]    def start_test(self):
        # Check all expanders
        expander_list = self.cold_storage_utils.getExpanderlist(self.host)
        expander_number = len(expander_list)
        AutovalUtils.validate_equal(expander_number,
            self.DEFAULT_ARGS["num_expanders"], "number of Expanders")

        tests_info = {
            "power_cycle": self.powercycle,
            "drive_enumeration": self.drive_enumeration,
            "hba_enumeration": self.hba_enumeration,
            "fio": self.run_coldstorage_fio,
            "fio_thermal": self.fio_thermal,
            "performance_latency": self.performance_latency,
            "performance_data_transfer_rate": self.performance_data_transfer_rate,
            "error_handling": self.error_handling,
            "drive_powercycle": self.drive_powercycle,
            "sert": self.sert,
            "data_protection": self.data_protection,
            "cache_feature_check": self.cache_feature_check,
        }

        if self.DEFAULT_ARGS["test"] in tests_info:
            tests_info[self.DEFAULT_ARGS["test"]](expander_list)



[docs]    def powercycle(self, expander_list):
        AutovalUtils.log_info("Running HDD Power-on/off Test.")
        cycle_count = self.DEFAULT_ARGS["cycle_count"]

        # Get events
        events_before = self.cold_storage_utils.get_event_errors(self.host,
            expander_list)

        for j in range(1, cycle_count + 1):
            AutovalUtils.log_info("Running HDD Power-on/off Test : Iteration %s" % j)
            for index in range(0, 15):
                # Power-on all drives in the vslot
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Powering-on vSlot number %s" % index)
                self.cold_storage_utils._bancsi(self.host)
                self.cold_storage_utils.virtual_slot_power_onoff(self.host, True, index,
                    expander_list)
                # Power-off all drives in the vslot
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Powering-off vSlot number %s" % index)
                self.cold_storage_utils.virtual_slot_power_onoff(self.host,
                    False, index, expander_list)

            # Get events and compare
            events_after = self.cold_storage_utils.get_event_errors(self.host,
                expander_list)

            diff = AutovalUtils.compare_configs(events_before,
                events_after,
                self.cfg_filter)
            AutovalUtils.validate_empty_diff(diff, "events")



[docs]    def cache_feature_check(self, expander_list):
        """
            Method to verify on/off funcionality of WCD feature. And verify WCD
            remains disabled on all drives after powercycling the host.
        """
        AutovalUtils.log_info("Drive Cache Feature Check Test.")
        for name in ["reset", "ac", "dc"]:
            for index in range(0, 15):
                expander_list = self.cold_storage_utils.getExpanderlist(
                    self.host)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Powering-on vSlot number %s" % index)
                self.cold_storage_utils.virtual_slot_power_onoff(self.host, True, index,
                    expander_list)
                self.cold_storage_utils.enable_hdd_cache(self.host)
                self.cold_storage_utils.disable_hdd_cache(self.host)
                self.cold_storage_utils.powercycle(self.host, name)
                self.cold_storage_utils._bancsi(self.host)
                # Check write cache disabled on all hdds
                self.cold_storage_utils.check_cache_config(self.host)
                # Check 2 different ways to make all drives off
                if (index % 2) != 0:
                    # Powercycle the enclosure
                    self.run_powercycle_enclosure()
                else:
                    # Power-off all available drives
                    AutovalUtils.log_info("Powering-off all drives")
                    self.cold_storage_utils.power_off_all(self.host)



[docs]    def drive_enumeration(self, expander_list):
        AutovalUtils.log_info("Running Drive Enumeration Test.")
        AutovalUtils.log_info("Running Drive Enumeration Test (baseline)")

        # Check max hdd on per expander
        self.cold_storage_utils.check_max_hdd_on(self.host, expander_list,
            self.DEFAULT_ARGS["maxhdd"])

        # Check expander FW version
        self.cold_storage_utils.check_fw_version(self.host, expander_list,
            self.DEFAULT_ARGS["fw"])

        # Disable write_cache on HBA
        AutovalUtils.log_info("Disabling write cache on HBA")
        self.cold_storage_utils.disable_writecache_hba(self.host)

        # Disable write_cache on HDD
        for index in range(0, 15):
            AutovalUtils.log_info("Powering-on vSlot number %s" % index)
            self.cold_storage_utils._bancsi(self.host)
            self.cold_storage_utils.virtual_slot_power_onoff(self.host, True,
                index, expander_list)
            self.cold_storage_utils.disable_hdd_cache(self.host)

            AutovalUtils.log_info("Powering-off vSlot number %s" % index)
            self.cold_storage_utils.virtual_slot_power_onoff(self.host, False,
                index, expander_list)

        cycle_count = self.DEFAULT_ARGS["cycle_count"]
        for j in range(1, cycle_count + 1):
            AutovalUtils.log_info("Running Drive Enumeration Test : Iteration %s" % j)

            # Check all controllers
            contr = self.cold_storage_utils.get_controllers(self.host)
            AutovalUtils.validate_equal(self.DEFAULT_ARGS["controllers_number"],
                contr, "controllers")

            # Power-on one drive in each expander at a time
            for slot in range(0, self.DEFAULT_ARGS["slots"]):
                self.cold_storage_utils._bancsi(self.host)
                for key in expander_list:
                    self.cold_storage_utils.call_fbjbod_power_command(self.host,
                        True, slot, key)

                #Check hdd type
                AutovalUtils.log_info("HDD type checking")
                self.cold_storage_utils.check_device_type(self.host,
                    self.DEFAULT_ARGS["type"])
                # Check smart data
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Smart data checking")
                self.cold_storage_utils.get_smart_output(self.host)
                # Check write-read cache
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Write cache config checking")
                self.cold_storage_utils.check_cache_config(self.host)
                self.cold_storage_utils.enable_hdd_cache(self.host)
                self.cold_storage_utils.disable_hdd_cache(self.host)
                self.cold_storage_utils.check_cache_size(self.host)
                # Check interface speed
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Interface speed checking")
                self.cold_storage_utils.drive_interface_speed_check(self.host,
                    self.DEFAULT_ARGS["interface_speed"])
                # Check status of all disks
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Disks enumeration checking")
                os_hdd = self.cold_storage_utils.get_os_hdds(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(os_hdd,
                    self.DEFAULT_ARGS["num_expanders"], "disks from OS")
                hba_hdd = self.cold_storage_utils.get_hba_hdds(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(hba_hdd,
                    self.DEFAULT_ARGS["num_expanders"], "disks from HBA")
                jbod_hdd = self.cold_storage_utils.get_jbod_hdds(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(jbod_hdd,
                    self.DEFAULT_ARGS["num_expanders"], "disks from JBOD")

                # Power-off one drive in each expander at a time
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Powering-off slot number %s" % slot)
                for key in expander_list:
                    self.cold_storage_utils.call_fbjbod_power_command(self.host,
                        False, slot, key)



[docs]    def hba_enumeration(self, expander_list):
        AutovalUtils.log_info("Running HBA Enumeration Test.")
        cycle_count = self.DEFAULT_ARGS["cycle_count"]
        for j in range(1, cycle_count + 1):
            AutovalUtils.log_info("Running HBA Enumeration Test : Iteration %s" % j)

            # Power-on N drives in each expander at a time (max 4 supported)
            for i in range(5):
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Case %d: Powered-on %d hdd on expander" % (i, i))
                for key in expander_list:
                    for slot in range(0, i * 10, 10):
                        self.cold_storage_utils.call_fbjbod_power_command(
                            self.host, True, slot, key)
                self.cold_storage_utils._bancsi(self.host)

                # Check status of all disks
                os_hdd = self.cold_storage_utils.get_os_hdds(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(os_hdd,
                    i * self.DEFAULT_ARGS["num_expanders"], "disks from OS")
                hba_hdd = self.cold_storage_utils.get_hba_hdds(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(hba_hdd,
                    i * self.DEFAULT_ARGS["num_expanders"], "disks from HBA")
                jbod_hdd = self.cold_storage_utils.get_jbod_hdds(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(jbod_hdd,
                    i * self.DEFAULT_ARGS["num_expanders"], "disks from JBOD")

                # Powercycle all expanders
                self.run_powercycle_enclosure()
                expander_list = self.cold_storage_utils.getExpanderlist(self.host)

                # Check controllers
                out = self.cold_storage_utils.get_controllers(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(out,
                    self.DEFAULT_ARGS["controllers_number"], "controllers")

                # Check expanders from OS, HBA and JBOD
                out = self.cold_storage_utils.get_os_expanders(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(out,
                    self.DEFAULT_ARGS["num_expanders"], "expanders from OS")
                output = self.cold_storage_utils.get_hba_expanders(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(output,
                    self.DEFAULT_ARGS["num_expanders"], "expanders from HBA")
                exp = self.cold_storage_utils.getExpanderlist(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(len(exp),
                    self.DEFAULT_ARGS["num_expanders"], "expanders from JBOD")

                # Check drives
                os_hdd = self.cold_storage_utils.get_os_hdds(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(os_hdd, 0, "disks from OS")
                hba_hdd = self.cold_storage_utils.get_hba_hdds(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(hba_hdd, 0, "disks from HBA")
                jbod_hdd = self.cold_storage_utils.get_jbod_hdds(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(jbod_hdd, 0, "disks from JBOD")

            for index in range(0, 15):
                # Power-on all drives in the vslot
                self.cold_storage_utils._bancsi(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Case %s: Powered-on vSlot %s" %
                    (index + 5, index))
                self.cold_storage_utils.virtual_slot_power_onoff(self.host, True, index,
                    expander_list)

                # Check status of all disks
                os_hdd = self.cold_storage_utils.get_os_hdds(self.host)
                hba_hdd = self.cold_storage_utils.get_hba_hdds(self.host)
                jbod_hdd = self.cold_storage_utils.get_jbod_hdds(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(os_hdd, jbod_hdd, "disks from OS")
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(jbod_hdd, hba_hdd, "disks from JBOD")

                # Powercycle all expanders
                self.run_powercycle_enclosure()
                expander_list = self.cold_storage_utils.getExpanderlist(self.host)

                # Check controllers
                out = self.cold_storage_utils.get_controllers(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(out,
                    self.DEFAULT_ARGS["controllers_number"], "controllers")

                # Check expanders from OS, HBA and JBOD
                out = self.cold_storage_utils.get_os_expanders(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(out,
                    self.DEFAULT_ARGS["num_expanders"], "expanders from OS")
                output = self.cold_storage_utils.get_hba_expanders(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(output,
                    self.DEFAULT_ARGS["num_expanders"], "expanders from HBA")
                exp = self.cold_storage_utils.getExpanderlist(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(len(exp),
                    self.DEFAULT_ARGS["num_expanders"], "expanders from JBOD")

                # Check drives
                os_hdd = self.cold_storage_utils.get_os_hdds(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(os_hdd, 0, "disks from OS")
                hba_hdd = self.cold_storage_utils.get_hba_hdds(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(hba_hdd, 0, "disks from HBA")
                jbod_hdd = self.cold_storage_utils.get_jbod_hdds(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(jbod_hdd, 0, "disks from JBOD")



[docs]    def run_coldstorage_fio(self, expander_list):
        AutovalUtils.log_info("Running Cold Storage FIO Test.")
        cycle_count = self.DEFAULT_ARGS["cycle_count"]
        expander_list = self.cold_storage_utils.getExpanderlist(self.host)

        for j in range(1, cycle_count + 1):
            AutovalUtils.log_info("Cold Storage FIO Test : Iteration %s" % j)
            for index in range(0, 15):
                # Power-on all drives in the vslot
                self.cold_storage_utils._bancsi(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Powering-on vSlot number %s" % index)
                self.cold_storage_utils.virtual_slot_power_onoff(self.host, True, index,
                    expander_list)

                # Run FIO write
                self.cold_storage_utils.fio_read_write(self.host, "write", scale=True)

                # Restart all drives in the vslot
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Powering-off vSlot number %s" % index)
                self.cold_storage_utils.virtual_slot_power_onoff(self.host,
                    False, index,
                    expander_list)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Powering-on vSlot number %s" % index)
                self.cold_storage_utils.virtual_slot_power_onoff(self.host, True, index,
                    expander_list)

                # Run FIO read
                self.cold_storage_utils.fio_read_write(self.host, "read", scale=True)

                # Power-off all drives in the vslot
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Powering-off vSlot number %s" % index)
                self.cold_storage_utils.virtual_slot_power_onoff(self.host,
                    False, index,
                    expander_list)



[docs]    def fio_thermal(self, expander_list):
        AutovalUtils.log_info("Running FIO Thermal Test.")
        cycle_count = self.DEFAULT_ARGS["cycle_count"]
        for j in range(1, cycle_count + 1):
            AutovalUtils.log_info("Running FIO Thermal Test : Iteration %s" % j)

            # Get initial expanders temperature
            AutovalUtils.log_info("Collect initial Expander temperature")
            dict_init_temp = self.cold_storage_utils.get_expanders_temp(
                self.host, expander_list)

            # Check initial expanders power consumption
            AutovalUtils.log_info("Collect initial Expander power consumption")
            dict_init_power = self.cold_storage_utils.get_expanders_power(
                self.host, expander_list)

            # Power-on all drives in the vslot
            for index in range(0, 15):
                self.cold_storage_utils._bancsi(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Powering-on vSlot number %s" % index)
                self.cold_storage_utils.virtual_slot_power_onoff(self.host,
                    True, index, expander_list)

                # Get initial HDD temperature
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Collect beginning HDD temperature")
                dict_hdds_start = self.cold_storage_utils.get_hdds_temp(self.host)

                # Get beginning expander power consumption
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Collect beginning Expander power consumption")
                dict_start_power = self.cold_storage_utils.get_expanders_power(
                    self.host, expander_list)

                # Get beginning expanders temperature
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Collect beginning Expander temperature")
                dict_start_temp = self.cold_storage_utils.get_expanders_temp(
                    self.host, expander_list)

                # Logging the difference in power and temperature
                for key in dict_start_power:
                    AutovalUtils.log_info(
                        "Expander power changed in %s from %s W to %s W"
                        % (key, dict_init_power[key], dict_start_power[key]))
                    AutovalUtils.log_info(
                        "Expander temperature changed in %s from %s C to %s C"
                        % (key, dict_init_temp[key], dict_start_temp[key]))

                # Run write FIO
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Performing FIO sequential write to disks")
                self.cold_storage_utils.fio_read_write(self.host, "write")

                # Run read FIO
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Performing FIO sequential read from disks")
                self.cold_storage_utils.fio_read_write(self.host, "read")

                # Get current Expander power consumption
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Collect current Expander power consumption")
                dict_current_power = self.cold_storage_utils.get_expanders_power(
                    self.host, expander_list)

                # Get current temperature
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Collect current Expander temperature")
                dict_expanders = self.cold_storage_utils.get_expanders_temp(
                    self.host, expander_list)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Collect current HDD temperature")
                dict_hdds = self.cold_storage_utils.get_hdds_temp(self.host)

                # Logging the difference in Expander power & temperature
                for key in dict_current_power:
                    AutovalUtils.log_info(
                        "Expander power changed in %s from %s W to %s W"
                        % (key, dict_start_power[key], dict_current_power[key]))
                    AutovalUtils.log_info(
                        "Expander temperature changed in %s from %s C to %s C"
                        % (key, dict_start_temp[key], dict_expanders[key]))

                for key in dict_hdds:
                    AutovalUtils.validate_condition(
                        (dict_hdds_start[key] - dict_hdds[key]) <= 10,
                        "HDD temperature changed in %s from %s C to %s C"
                        % (key, dict_hdds[key], dict_hdds_start[key]),
                        log_on_pass=False)

                # Power-off all drives in vslot
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Powering-off vSlot number %s" % index)
                self.cold_storage_utils.virtual_slot_power_onoff(self.host,
                    False, index, expander_list)

                # Get end expanders temperature
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Collect end Expander temperature")
                dict_end_temp = self.cold_storage_utils.get_expanders_temp(
                    self.host, expander_list)

                # Check end expanders power consumption
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Collect end Expander power consumption")
                dict_end_power = self.cold_storage_utils.get_expanders_power(
                    self.host, expander_list)

                # Check difference in Expander power & temperature
                for key in dict_end_power:
                    AutovalUtils.log_info(
                        "Expander end power changed in %s from %s W to %s W"
                        % (key, dict_current_power[key], dict_end_power[key]))
                    AutovalUtils.log_info(
                        "Expander end temperature changed in %s from %s C to %s C"
                        % (key, dict_expanders[key], dict_end_temp[key]))



[docs]    def performance_latency(self, expander_list):
        AutovalUtils.log_info("Running Performance Latency Test.")
        self.cold_storage_utils.tools_check(self.host)
        cycle_count = self.DEFAULT_ARGS["cycle_count"]
        for j in range(1, cycle_count + 1):
            AutovalUtils.log_info("Running Performance Latency Test: Iteration %s" % j)

            # Counters
            max_read = {}
            max_write = {}
            max_read_write = {}

            # Power-on all drives in Vslot
            for index in range(0, 15):
                self.cold_storage_utils._bancsi(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Powering-on vSlot number %s" % index)
                self.cold_storage_utils.virtual_slot_power_onoff(self.host, True, index,
                    expander_list)

                # Read latency
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Read latency by IOPING")
                read_dict = self.cold_storage_utils.get_hdd_latency(self.host,
                    "read")
                read = max(read_dict.values())
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Read latency on vSlot %s is %s ms" %
                    (index, read))
                max_read[index] = read

                # Write latency
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Write latency by IOPING")
                write_dict = self.cold_storage_utils.get_hdd_latency(self.host,
                    "write")
                write = max(write_dict.values())
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Write latency on vSlot %s is %.2f ms"
                    % (index, write))
                max_write[index] = write

                # Read-write latency
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Read-write latency by IOPING")
                write_dict = self.cold_storage_utils.get_hdd_latency(self.host,
                    "read-write")
                write = max(write_dict.values())
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Read-write latency on vSlot %s is %.2f ms"
                    % (index, write))
                max_read_write[index] = write

                # Power-on all drives in Vslot
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Powering-off vSlot number %s" % index)
                self.cold_storage_utils.virtual_slot_power_onoff(self.host,
                    False, index, expander_list)
                self.cold_storage_utils._bancsi(self.host)

            # Consolidate results
            read = max(max_read.values())
            write = max(max_write.values())
            read_write = max(max_read_write.values())
            AutovalUtils.log_info("Max average read latency is %.2f ms" % read)
            AutovalUtils.log_info("Max average write latency is %.2f ms" % write)
            AutovalUtils.log_info("Max average read-write latency is %.2f ms" %
                read_write)



[docs]    def performance_data_transfer_rate(self, expander_list):
        AutovalUtils.log_info("Running Performance Data Transfer Rate Test.")
        cycle_count = self.DEFAULT_ARGS["cycle_count"]
        for j in range(1, cycle_count + 1):
            AutovalUtils.log_info("Running Performance Test: Iteration %s" % j)

            # Counters
            min_bw_read = {}
            min_bw_write = {}
            min_iops_read = {}
            min_iops_write = {}
            max_lat_read = {}
            max_lat_write = {}
            max_slat_read = {}
            max_slat_write = {}
            max_clat_read = {}
            max_clat_write = {}

            for index in range(0, 15):
                # Power-on all drives in Vslot
                self.cold_storage_utils._bancsi(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Powering-on vSlot number %s" % index)
                self.cold_storage_utils.virtual_slot_power_onoff(self.host, True, index,
                    expander_list)

                # Run fio
                # self.host.autotest.run("fio_fb_perf", "control_coldstorage",
                #                       timeout=26000)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Running FIO: sequential write 10Mb")
                write_dict = self.cold_storage_utils.fio_read_write(
                    self.host, "write")

                # Parse values
                min_bw_write[index] = min(
                    map(lambda a: write_dict[a]["bw"], write_dict))
                min_iops_write[index] = min(
                    map(lambda a: write_dict[a]["iops"], write_dict))
                max_lat_write[index] = max(
                    map(lambda a: write_dict[a]["lat"], write_dict))
                max_slat_write[index] = max(
                    map(lambda a: write_dict[a]["slat"], write_dict))
                max_clat_write[index] = max(
                    map(lambda a: write_dict[a]["clat"], write_dict))

                # Run fio read
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Running FIO: sequential read 10Mb")
                read_dict = self.cold_storage_utils.fio_read_write(self.host, "read")

                # Parse values
                min_bw_read[index] = min(
                    map(lambda a: read_dict[a]["bw"], read_dict))
                min_iops_read[index] = min(
                    map(lambda a: read_dict[a]["iops"], read_dict))
                max_lat_read[index] = max(
                    map(lambda a: read_dict[a]["lat"], read_dict))
                max_slat_read[index] = max(
                    map(lambda a: read_dict[a]["slat"], read_dict))
                max_clat_read[index] = max(
                    map(lambda a: read_dict[a]["clat"], read_dict))

                # Power-off all drives in Vslot
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Powering-off vSlot number %s" % index)
                self.cold_storage_utils.virtual_slot_power_onoff(self.host,
                    False, index, expander_list)

            # Consolidate resutls
            iops_read = min(min_iops_read.values())
            iops_write = min(min_iops_write.values())
            bw_read = min(min_bw_read.values())
            bw_write = min(min_bw_write.values())

            lat_read = max(max_lat_read.values())
            lat_write = max(max_lat_write.values())
            slat_read = max(max_slat_read.values())
            slat_write = max(max_slat_write.values())
            clat_read = max(max_clat_read.values())
            clat_write = max(max_clat_write.values())

            AutovalUtils.log_info(
                "Read: avg_bw=%.2f MiB/s, avg_iops=%.2f, avg_lat=%.2f ms, \
                    avg_slat=%.2f ms, avg_clat=%.2f ms" %
                (bw_read / 1024, iops_read, lat_read, slat_read, clat_read))
            AutovalUtils.log_info(
                "Write: avg_bw=%.2f MiB/s, avg_iops=%.2f, avg_lat=%.2f ms, \
                    avg_slat=%.2f ms, avg_clat=%.2f ms"
                % (bw_write / 1024, iops_write, lat_write, slat_write, clat_write))



[docs]    def error_handling(self, expander_list):
        AutovalUtils.log_info("Error Handling Test.")
        cycle_count = self.DEFAULT_ARGS["cycle_count"]
        for j in range(1, cycle_count + 1):
            AutovalUtils.log_info("Error Handling Test. Iteration %s" % j)
            # Get events
            events_before = self.cold_storage_utils.get_event_errors(self.host,
                expander_list)

            # Power-on one drive in each expander at a time
            for slot in range(0, self.DEFAULT_ARGS["slots"]):
                self.cold_storage_utils._bancsi(self.host)
                for exp in expander_list:
                    self.cold_storage_utils.call_fbjbod_power_command(self.host,
                        True, slot, exp)

                # Check hdd status
                self.cold_storage_utils.check_hdd_status(self.host)

                # Get initial hdd errors
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Get initial HDD errors")
                hdd_init = self.cold_storage_utils.get_hdd_errors(self.host)

                # Make the bad block (assume sector 32'000'000)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Create a bad sector on each HDD")
                self.cold_storage_utils.make_bad_sector(self.host, 320000)

                # Get hdd errors after test
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Get HDD errors after damage")
                hdd_before = self.cold_storage_utils.get_hdd_errors(self.host)

                # Check difference
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Check difference")
                manufacturer = self.cold_storage_utils.get_drive_manufacturer(self.host)
                pattern_before = {
                    "Raw_Read_Error_Rate": 0,
                    "Seek_Error_Rate": 0,
                    "UDMA_CRC_Error_Count": 0,
                    "Current_Pending_Sector": 1}

                if manufacturer != "TOSHIBA":
                    pattern_before.update({"Raw_Read_Error_Rate": 1})
                for key in hdd_before:
                    errors_init = hdd_init[key]
                    errors_before = hdd_before[key]
                    for key2 in pattern_before:
                        diff = errors_before[key2] - errors_init[key2]
                        AutovalUtils.validate_equal(diff, pattern_before[key2],
                            "%s = %d on disk %s" % (key2, errors_before[key2], key),
                            log_on_pass=False)

                # Repair the bad sector
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Repair bad sector on each HDD")
                self.cold_storage_utils.repair_bad_sector(self.host, 320000)

                # Get hdd error after test
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Get HDD errors after repair")
                hdd_after = self.cold_storage_utils.get_hdd_errors(self.host)

                # Check difference
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Check difference")
                pattern_after = {
                    "Raw_Read_Error_Rate": 0,
                    "Seek_Error_Rate": 0,
                    "UDMA_CRC_Error_Count": 0,
                    "Current_Pending_Sector": 0}

                if manufacturer != "TOSHIBA":
                    pattern_after.update({"Raw_Read_Error_Rate" : 1})
                for key in hdd_after:
                    errors_init = hdd_init[key]
                    errors_after = hdd_after[key]
                    for key2 in pattern_after:
                        diff = errors_after[key2] - errors_init[key2]
                        AutovalUtils.validate_equal(diff, pattern_after[key2],
                            "%s = %d on disk %s" % (key2, errors_after[key2], key),
                            log_on_pass=False)

                # Power-off one drive in each expander at a time
                for exp in expander_list:
                    self.cold_storage_utils.call_fbjbod_power_command(self.host,
                        False, slot, exp)

                # Get events and compare
                events_after = self.cold_storage_utils.get_event_errors(self.host,
                    expander_list)
                diff = AutovalUtils.compare_configs(events_before, events_after)
                AutovalUtils.validate_empty_diff(diff, "events")



[docs]    def drive_powercycle(self, expander_list):
        AutovalUtils.log_info("Running Drive Powercycle Test.")
        cycle_count = self.DEFAULT_ARGS["cycle_count"]

        for j in range(1, cycle_count + 1):
            AutovalUtils.log_info("Running Drive Powercycle Test : Iteration %s" % j)

            # Power-on all drives in Vslot
            for index in range(0, 15):
                self.cold_storage_utils._bancsi(self.host)
                expander_list = self.cold_storage_utils.getExpanderlist(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Powering-on vSlot number %s" % index)
                self.cold_storage_utils.virtual_slot_power_onoff(self.host, True, index,
                    expander_list)

                #Get number of disks
                exp_hdd = self.cold_storage_utils.get_os_hdds(self.host)

                # Run write FIO
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Performing FIO sequential write to disks")
                self.cold_storage_utils.fio_read_write(self.host, "write")

                # Check 5 different ways to reboot server
                if index < 3:
                    self.cold_storage_utils.powercycle(self.host, "reboot")
                elif index < 6:
                    self.cold_storage_utils.powercycle(self.host, "ac")
                elif index < 9:
                    self.cold_storage_utils.powercycle(self.host, "reset")
                elif index < 12:
                    self.cold_storage_utils.powercycle(self.host, "dc")
                else:
                    self.cold_storage_utils.powercycle(self.host, "warm")
                self.cold_storage_utils._bancsi(self.host)

                # Check components
                out = self.cold_storage_utils.get_controllers(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(out,
                    self.DEFAULT_ARGS["controllers_number"], "controllers")
                output = self.cold_storage_utils.get_os_expanders(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(output,
                    self.DEFAULT_ARGS["num_expanders"], "expanders")
                jbod_hdd = self.cold_storage_utils.get_jbod_hdds(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(jbod_hdd, exp_hdd, "disks from JBOD")
                hba_hdd = self.cold_storage_utils.get_hba_hdds(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(hba_hdd, exp_hdd, "disks from HBA")
                os_hdd = self.cold_storage_utils.get_os_hdds(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(os_hdd, exp_hdd, "disks from OS")

                # Run read FIO
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Performing FIO sequential read from disks")
                self.cold_storage_utils.fio_read_write(self.host, "read")

                # Get events
                expander_list = self.cold_storage_utils.getExpanderlist(self.host)
                events_before = self.cold_storage_utils.get_event_errors(self.host,
                    expander_list)

                # Check events
                for key in events_before:
                    AutovalUtils.validate_condition(events_before[key] == '',
                        "%s: %s is empty"
                        % (key, events_before), log_on_pass=False)

                # Check 2 different ways to make all drives off
                if (index % 2) != 0:
                    # Powercycle the enclosure
                    self.run_powercycle_enclosure()
                    self.cold_storage_utils._bancsi(self.host)
                else:
                    # Power-off all available drives
                    AutovalUtils.log_info("Powering-off all drives")
                    self.cold_storage_utils.power_off_all(self.host)
                    self.cold_storage_utils._bancsi(self.host)

                # Check drives
                os_hdd = self.cold_storage_utils.get_os_hdds(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(os_hdd, 0, "disks from OS")
                hba_hdd = self.cold_storage_utils.get_hba_hdds(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(hba_hdd, 0, "disks from HBA")
                jbod_hdd = self.cold_storage_utils.get_jbod_hdds(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.validate_equal(jbod_hdd, 0, "disks from JBOD")

                # Get events
                expander_list = self.cold_storage_utils.getExpanderlist(self.host)
                events_after = self.cold_storage_utils.get_event_errors(self.host,
                    expander_list)

                # Check events
                for key in events_after:
                    AutovalUtils.validate_condition(events_after[key] == '',
                        "%s: %s is empty"
                        % (key, events_after), log_on_pass=False)



[docs]    def sert(self, expander_list):
        AutovalUtils.log_info("Running System Error Ratio Test.")
        cycle_count = self.DEFAULT_ARGS["cycle_count"]
        for j in range(1, cycle_count + 1):
            AutovalUtils.log_info("Running System Error Ratio Test: Iteration %s" % j)

            # Get events
            events_before = self.cold_storage_utils.get_event_errors(self.host,
                expander_list)

            # Power-on all drives in Vslot
            for index in range(0, 15):
                self.cold_storage_utils._bancsi(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Powering-on vSlot number %s" % index)
                self.cold_storage_utils.virtual_slot_power_onoff(self.host, True, index,
                    expander_list)

                # Get error rate before write FIO
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Get JBOD errors before write FIO")
                jbod_init = self.cold_storage_utils.get_jbod_errors(self.host,
                    expander_list)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Get HBA errors before write FIO")
                adapter_init = self.cold_storage_utils.get_adapter_errors(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Get HDD errors before write FIO")
                hdd_init = self.cold_storage_utils.get_hdd_errors(self.host)

                # Run write FIO
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Performing FIO random write to disks")
                self.cold_storage_utils.fio_read_write(self.host, "randwrite")

                # Get error rate after write FIO
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Get JBOD errors after write FIO")
                jbod_write = self.cold_storage_utils.get_jbod_errors(
                    self.host, expander_list)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Get HBA errors after write FIO")
                adapter_write = self.cold_storage_utils.get_adapter_errors(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Get HDD errors after write FIO")
                hdd_write = self.cold_storage_utils.get_hdd_errors(self.host)

                # Check error difference
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Check JBOD errors difference")
                diff = AutovalUtils.compare_configs(jbod_init, jbod_write)
                AutovalUtils.validate_empty_diff(diff, "JBOD errors", log_on_pass=False)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Check HBA errors difference")
                diff = AutovalUtils.compare_configs(adapter_init, adapter_write)
                AutovalUtils.validate_empty_diff(diff, "HBA errors", log_on_pass=False)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Check HDD errors difference")
                diff = AutovalUtils.compare_configs(hdd_init, hdd_write)
                AutovalUtils.validate_empty_diff(diff, "HDD errors", log_on_pass=False)

                # Get value was written to HDD in Gb
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Get value written to HDD")
                Gb_dict = self.cold_storage_utils.get_hdd_written(self.host)
                for key in Gb_dict:
                    value = Gb_dict[key]
                    AutovalUtils.validate_equal(value, 10.0, "Gb was written",
                        log_on_pass=False)

                # Powercycle all expanders
                self.run_powercycle_enclosure()
                expander_list = self.cold_storage_utils.getExpanderlist(self.host)

                # Some errors may appear after powercycle
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Get JBOD errors after powercycle")
                jbod_errors = self.cold_storage_utils.get_jbod_errors(
                    self.host, expander_list)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Get HBA errors after powercycle")
                adapter_errors = self.cold_storage_utils.get_adapter_errors(self.host)

                # Verify errors
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Checking JBOD errors after powercycle")
                for key in jbod_errors:
                    err = jbod_errors[key]
                    #Acceptable 1 hdd error per expander
                    AutovalUtils.validate_less_equal(err,
                        self.DEFAULT_ARGS["num_expanders"] * (index + 1),
                        "JBOD errors", log_on_pass=False)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Checking HBA errors after powercycle")
                for key in adapter_errors:
                    err = adapter_errors[key]
                    #Acceptable 1 error per expander
                    AutovalUtils.validate_less_equal(err,
                        self.DEFAULT_ARGS["num_expanders"] * (index + 1) * 2,
                        "HBA errors", log_on_pass=False)

                # Power-on all drives again
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Power-on Vslot number %s" % index)
                self.cold_storage_utils.virtual_slot_power_onoff(self.host, True, index,
                    expander_list)

                # Get error rate before read FIO
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Get JBOD errors before read FIO")
                jbod_before = self.cold_storage_utils.get_jbod_errors(
                    self.host, expander_list)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Get HBA errors before read FIO")
                adapter_before = self.cold_storage_utils.get_adapter_errors(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Get HDD errors before read FIO")
                hdd_before = self.cold_storage_utils.get_hdd_errors(self.host)

                # Run read FIO
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Performing FIO random read from disks")
                self.cold_storage_utils.fio_read_write(self.host, "randread")

                # Get error rate after read FIO
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Get JBOD errors after read FIO")
                jbod_read = self.cold_storage_utils.get_jbod_errors(self.host,
                    expander_list)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Get HBA errors after read FIO")
                adapter_read = self.cold_storage_utils.get_adapter_errors(self.host)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Get HDD errors after read FIO")
                hdd_read = self.cold_storage_utils.get_hdd_errors(self.host)

                # Check difference
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Check JBOD errors difference")
                diff = AutovalUtils.compare_configs(jbod_before, jbod_read)
                AutovalUtils.validate_empty_diff(diff, "JBOD errors", log_on_pass=False)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Check HBA errors difference")
                diff = AutovalUtils.compare_configs(adapter_before, adapter_read)
                AutovalUtils.validate_empty_diff(diff, "HBA errors", log_on_pass=False)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Check HDD errors difference")
                diff = AutovalUtils.compare_configs(hdd_before, hdd_read)
                AutovalUtils.validate_empty_diff(diff, "HDD errors", log_on_pass=False)

                # Power-off all drives
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Powering-off vSlot number %s" % index)
                self.cold_storage_utils.virtual_slot_power_onoff(self.host,
                    False, index, expander_list)

                # Some errors may appear after power-off
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Get JBOD errors after power-off")
                jbod_read = self.cold_storage_utils.get_jbod_errors(self.host,
                    expander_list)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Get HBA errors after power-off")
                adapter_read = self.cold_storage_utils.get_adapter_errors(self.host)

                # Verify errors
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Checking JBOD errors after power-off")
                for key in jbod_errors:
                    err = jbod_errors[key]
                    #Acceptable 1 hdd error per expander
                    AutovalUtils.validate_less_equal(err,
                        self.DEFAULT_ARGS["num_expanders"] * (index + 1),
                        "JBOD errors", log_on_pass=False)
                AutovalUtils.log_info("Checking HBA errors after power-off")
                for key in adapter_errors:
                    err = adapter_errors[key]
                    # Acceptable 1 error per expander
                    AutovalUtils.validate_less_equal(err,
                        self.DEFAULT_ARGS["num_expanders"] * (index + 1) * 2,
                        "HBA errors", log_on_pass=False)

            # Get events and compare
            events_after = self.cold_storage_utils.get_event_errors(self.host,
                expander_list)
            diff = AutovalUtils.compare_configs(events_before, events_after)
            AutovalUtils.validate_empty_diff(diff, "events")



[docs]    def data_protection(self, expander_list):
        AutovalUtils.log_info("Data Protection Test.")
        events_before = self.cold_storage_utils.get_event_errors(self.host,
            expander_list)

        for j in range(1, self.cycle_count + 1):
            AutovalUtils.log_info("Data Protection Test. Iteration %s" % j)

            host_dict = {"hostname": self.host.hostname,
                "oob_addr": self.host.oob.oob_addr}
            # Power-on 1 drive in each expander
            for slot in range(self.DEFAULT_ARGS["slots"]):
                for key in expander_list:
                    self.cold_storage_utils.call_fbjbod_power_command(self.host,
                        True, slot, key)
                    # Run thread to interrupt write in 30 sec
                    fio_threads = []
                    fio_threads.append(
                        AutovalThread.start_autoval_thread(self.bg_hdd_poweroff,
                            host_dict, slot, key))
                    # Run write FIO
                    AutovalUtils.log_info("Performing random write on disk %s on %s"
                        % (slot, key))
                    self.cold_storage_utils.fio_read_write(self.host,
                        "randwrite", runtime_flag=True, interrupt=True)
                    try:
                        AutovalThread.wait_for_autoval_thread(fio_threads)
                    except Exception:
                        AutovalUtils.log_info("Failed to wait thread")
                        pass
                    # Power-on drive
                    self.cold_storage_utils.call_fbjbod_power_command(self.host,
                        True, slot, key)
                    # Run read FIO
                    AutovalUtils.log_info("Performing random read on disk %s on %s"
                        % (slot, key))
                    self.cold_storage_utils.fio_read_write(self.host,
                        "randread", runtime_flag=True)
                    # Power-off all drives
                    self.cold_storage_utils.call_fbjbod_power_command(self.host,
                        False, slot, key)
            # Get events and compare
            events_after = self.cold_storage_utils.get_event_errors(self.host,
                expander_list)

            diff = AutovalUtils.compare_configs(events_before,
                events_after,
                self.cfg_filter)
            AutovalUtils.validate_empty_diff(diff, "events")



[docs]    def bg_hdd_poweroff(self, host_dict, slot, key):
        host = Host(host_dict)
        time.sleep(45)
        AutovalUtils.log_info("Performing drive power cycle")
        AutovalUtils.run_on_host(host,
            self.cold_storage_utils.call_fbjbod_power_command, host, False,
                slot, key)

        return



[docs]    def get_cycle_config_filter(self):
        cfg_filter = []
        cfg_filter.append({'filter_name': 'OpenbmcResetStress'})
        return cfg_filter

        pass
